FuncDef:
The active port-srv6 command activates SRv6 interface licenses for boards in batches.
The undo active port-srv6 command deactivates SRv6 interface licenses for boards in batches.
By default, SRv6 interface licenses are not activated for boards.
CLIs: undo active port-srv6 slot <slotid> card <cardid> [ port <port-list> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a subcard ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 15.

Specifies a port list in which port numbers are separated using a comma (,) or hyphen (-).
The value is a string of 1 to 255 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the slot ID of a board.
The value is a string of 1 to 15 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: [~HUAWEI-license] undo active port-srv6 slot 1 card 0 port 0-8
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The SRv6 service can be configured on a board only after SRv6 interface licenses are activated for the board.
Precautions
After the license is applied, the SRv6 function can be enabled without entering the active port-srv6 command.
